Name: UEPI_visualizer
Title: Urban energy performance monitor
Description:
**UEPI (Urban Energy Performance Index)** combines heat‑loss signals (from LST analysis), building age, and building size into a relative retrofit‑priority score.  
**Scale 0–100:** **0 = high retrofit need (high priority)**, **100 = good (low priority)**.  
**Weighting:** heat loss **50%**, age **30%**, size **20%**. Critical cases (high loss + old building) and very large buildings receive additional amplification.
